thread.title: Bombshell Hailey Clauson stands up to cancer with Revolve Clothing - Swim Daily
thread.title_full: Bombshell Hailey Clauson stands up to cancer with Revolve Clothing - Swim Daily - SI.com

author: Melanie Metzman
title: Bombshell Hailey Clauson stands up to cancer with Revolve Clothing - Swim Daily
text:
by Kelsey Hendrix Posted: Mon Oct. 12, 2015 The ladies of SI Swimsuit aren't just beautiful on the outside—in fact, it's their inner beauty that makes us so proud to call them our own!
Teaming up with Revolve Clothing to support their new Stand Up to Cancer initiative, Hailey Clauson rocks 1970s inspired looks that are being sold to raise funds for cancer research. This capsule collection is available online now through December 31st, and features over 30 of the online retailer's most popular brands.
Photo: Revolve Clothing
Photo: Revolve Clothing For each piece from the collection sold, 30 percent of the profits will go to SU2C. Prices range from $44 to $550, and contributors include Mara Hoffman, Lovers + Friends, and Love & Lemons–just to name a few. And with 61 styles to choose from, there's guaranteed to be a piece that fits everyone's personal style.
Photo: Revolve Clothing
Photo: Revolve Clothing So what are you waiting for? Shop online and join our gorgeous rookie in the fight against cancer!
BONUS: See some of Hailey's best moments from SI Swimsuit 2015!
